title: Super Bot Football
description: Super Bot Football is an interactive web-based game where players control a team of robotic football players. The game features realistic physics, dynamic weather conditions, and challenging opponents. Players can customize their robots with different designs and abilities, and compete for championships in a futuristic football league.
tech: Physics engine (e.g., Cannon.js) for realistic robot movement
Web Audio API for sound effects and music
Local Storage or IndexedDB for saving player progress and game state
